title: Executor contact details
question: What are {executorName}’s contact details?
paragraph1: We will send {executorName} an email and text message to verify their identity and to confirm details of the estate.
paragraph2: You must provide their current email address and mobile phone number. For international numbers include the country code.

email.duplicate: You have used this email address for another executor

mobile.invalid: Enter a mobile phone number without spaces, international numbers must start with a plus sign
mobile.duplicate: You have used this mobile phone number for another executor
